item.title: Canadian charged with stealing $65 million using DeFI crypto exploits
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: The U.S. Justice Department has charged a Canadian man with stealing roughly $65 million after exploiting two decentralized finance (DeFI) protocols. [...]

item.title: Casio UK online store hacked to steal customer credit cards
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Casio UK's e-shop at casio.co.uk was hacked to include malicious scripts that stole credit card and customer information between January 14 and 24, 2025. [...]

item.title: Microsoft kills off Defender 'Privacy Protection' VPN feature
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Microsoft announced it is killing off its Privacy Protection VPN feature in the Microsoft Defender app at the end of the month to focus on other features. [...]

item.title: DeepSeek AI tools impersonated by infostealer malware on PyPI
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Threat actors are taking advantage of the rise in popularity of the DeepSeek to promote two malicious infostealer packages on the Python Package Index (PyPI), where they impersonated developer tools for the AI platform. [...]

item.title: PyPI adds project archiving system to stop malicious updates
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: The Python Package Index (PyPI) has announced the introduction of 'Project Archival,' a new system that allows publishers to archive their projects, indicating to the users that no updates are to be expected. [...]

item.title: Google says hackers abuse Gemini AI to empower their attacks
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Multiple state-sponsored groups are experimenting with the AI-powered Gemini assistant from Google to increase productivity and to conduct research on potential infrastructure for attacks or for reconnaissance on targets. [...]

item.title: Microsoft improves text contrast for all Windows Chromium browsers
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​Microsoft says it improved the contrast of text rendered in all Chromium-based web browsers on Windows, making it more readable on some displays. [...]

item.title: Indian tech giant Tata Technologies hit by ransomware attack
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Tata Technologies Ltd. had to suspend some of its IT services following a ransomware attack that impacted the company network. [...]

item.title: Globe Life data breach may impact an additional 850,000 clients
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Insurance giant Globe Life finished the investigation into the data breach it suffered last June and says that the incident may have impacted an additional 850,000 customers. [...]

item.title: Mizuno USA says hackers stayed in its network for two months
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​Mizuno USA, a subsidiary of Mizuno Corporation, one of the world's largest sporting goods manufacturers, confirmed in data breach notification letters that unknown attackers stole files from its network between August and October 2024. [...]

item.title: US healthcare provider data breach impacts 1 million patients
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Community Health Center (CHC), a leading Connecticut healthcare provider, is notifying over 1 million patients that their personal and health information was stolen in an October breach. [...]
